data.actual_result: Connections page pops in the first time you open it after restarting the app
data.expected_result: Connections page slides in when you open it
data.short_description: Connections page in settings pops in when opening it for the first time after restarting the app
data.steps_to_repro: - Completely close and reopen Discord - Go into user settings - Open the connections page, and observe the animation - Close the connections page, and then reopen it - Observe the animation the second time you open the page
